name: BR refusal
metaModel.name: StockMove
subject: Rejection or Cancellation of Receipt for Order $StockMove.purchaseOrderSet:{it|$it.externalReference$}$
content:
Good morning,

We regret to inform you that the receipt of order $StockMove.purchaseOrderSet:{it|$it.externalReference$}$ has been rejected or cancelled for the reason : $StockMove.cancelReason.name$.

Please find attached the details regarding this cancellation or rejection. To require any further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Axelor Team
